texts.text1: The free non-repayable grant can be allocated to you if:
texts.text2: The boiler which is hoping to be replaced must be 7+ years old, but carry a fault that affects its overall efficiency and operation. It must be deemed by an engineer to be beyond ‘economical’ repair.
texts.text3: Only those in receipt of certain benefits will fit the criteria to claim a free boiler grant.
texts.text4: The style of property in which you live is also taken into consideration too. The older and more in-efficient your property is, the more funding it will yield to go towards the grant. If you have a very efficient property, you may need to contribute a small amount to cover the cost of the install.
